page.title: 12Ropley Guides
page.content: There are Guide,Brownie and Cub groups in Ropley.There isn't a Scout troop as they can't find a leader.I am a Guide and we meet every Friday from 6.30 to 8.30 in the hut by the Coffee Rooms.We are a small company of about 15 with a head Guider,Miss Cass,and a helper,Mrs Nelson.There are two patrols,Robins & Kingfishers.In the summer we practise camp skills and outside activities.In the Winter and on rainy summer days we work for badges,future outings,camp & other events.At present we are working for the District Challenge Competition against other guides in the Alresford area.At the end of term some of us are going on a weekend practice camp here in Ropley and the more experienced Guides are going to Rushmoor for a weeks camp to celebrate 75 years of Guiding.
